src:
Matrica odnosov
Vzorci vedno delujejo zrcalno, osvetlijo pomanjkanje. Ko je lekcija naučena, privlačimo drugačen tip ljudi.
01 Nov 2019, 13:02 by M. B. Z.
Vzrok, da so nekateri odnosi težavni, je v tem, da podzavestno pritegnemo ljudi s podobnimi vzorci, kot so naši, ki izvirajo iz otroštva in so matrica za vse odnose, ki jih oblikujemo v odraslem življenju. Vzorci namreč vedno delujejo zrcalno, tako da z druge strani osvetlijo našo travmo ali pomanjkanje. Če vam je umrl eden od staršev, denimo dobite partnerja, ki vam vzbuja občutek zapuščenosti.Situacije se ponavljajo, dokler ne razrešite primarnega vzorca, nato pa ni več potrebe po tem, da bi življenje osvetljevalo vašo bolečo točko. Če je eden od partnerjev osredotočen na določeno čustveno ali mentalno stanje, se namreč lahko vklopi zakon enako pritegne enako. Dobite nekoga, ki podvoji ali zamaje vaše poglede. Razdelati morate travmatično izkušnjo ali prevladujoče prepričanje, da lahko začnete privabljati drugačen tip človeka. Hkrati lahko eden ali oba partnerja nosita karmo, povezano z odnosi, in sta se našla, da bi jo poravnala.Ni nujno, da sta nekaj naredila prav drug drugemu – oba sta lahko delovala z drugimi ljudmi, a ima eden na primer izkušnjo izkoriščanja in drugi izkoriščenosti, zdaj pa so vloge zamenjane. Če ste v preteklem življenju izkoriščali podrejene delavce, vam zdaj šef odreka zasluženo povišico. Nekoč ste umrli mladi in pustili otroke nepreskrbljene, zdaj pa zaradi njih ostajate v mrtvem zakonu. Zavedajte se, da je vaša duša izbrala to lekcijo, čeprav ni prijetna, da bi se nečesa naučili.
text:
The matrix of relationships
Samples always work in the mirror, illuminating the lack. When a lesson is learned, we are attracted to a different type of people.
01 Nov 2019, 13:02 by M. B. Z.
The reason some relationships are difficult is because we subconsciously attract people with similar patterns as ours, who originate from childhood and are the matrix for all the relationships we form in adulthood. The patterns are always mirrored, illuminating our trauma or lack. For example, if one of your parents has died, you get a partner who gives you a feeling of abandonment. The situation goes on until the primary pattern is resolved, and then there is no need for life to illuminate your sore spot. If one of the partners is focused on a particular emotional or mental state, the engagement of the marriage can be equally appealing. You get someone who doubles up or stuns your views. You need to share a traumatic experience or overwhelming belief that you can begin to attract a different type of person. At the same time, one or both partners can carry relationship-related karma and find one to settle it. It is not necessary that they did something right to each other - they were both able to interact with other people, but for example one has the experience of exploitation and others are being exploited, but now roles are being replaced. If you have exploited subordinate workers in your past life, your boss is now denying you a deserved raise. You once died young and left children unattended, but now you remain in a dead marriage because of them. Be aware that your soul has chosen this lesson, although it is not pleasant to learn something.
